# Rogue silicons
# Known variants # "Scrap units"
Come in all shapes and forms, it would seem that those were assembled locally from available materials.
# "Drones"
# "Servo unit"
Crush test dummy with burning desire to crush test your bones.
# "Herder unit"
# "Hunter unit"
# "Catcher unit"
# "Tesla unit"
# "Guardian unit"
# "One star unit"
# Missions objectives ## Elimination
Eliminate large and dangerous creature - [color=#a4885c]one star unit[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
## Destruction
Destroy a certain amount of [color=#a4885c]rogue ai nodes[/color] within given time constraints to earn a monetary reward.
